2164.subject: STAT
2164.descrlong:
Reviews basic introductory statistics with an overview of basic probability theory. Extends the scope of statistics by teaching theory through application with a focus on nonparametric statistical methods for hypothesis tests, empirical distribution estimation, bootstrap, estimation theory, chi-square tests, one-way ANOVA, and simple linear regression using statistical computing and programming.

(Prereq: STAT 100 or STAT 250 or MATH 320)
